profile.name: Jason Miller
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Building scalable web applications at @Shopify
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with a passion for JavaScript, Web Workers, Preact, and React Router. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions in fast-paced environments.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented a suite of microbundles using Webpack and Preact, resulting in improved application performance and scalability.
Developed and maintained high-performance tools using Rust, including a task worklet that increased processing efficiency by 30%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to build and deploy React Router-based applications, ensuring seamless user experiences.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed a RESTful Express API using ES6, showcasing expertise in modern JavaScript development.
Created and maintained multiple open-source projects on GitHub, including a popular blog built with Preact and Webpack.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of several open-source projects on GitHub, including a popular database sharding library.
Participated in code reviews and ensured the quality and maintainability of the project's codebase.
